messages.title: Standing Up for Real Change
messages.content: Your choice at this election is either to reward failure by voting Labour or Conservative, or to vote for UKIP. Labour bankrupts the country EVERY time they form a government. The Conservatives routinely break manifesto promises on the referendum, immigration, the deficit and the NHS. Voting UKIP gets policies for working people and cuts wasteful projects like HS2. I will protect local interests such as Crossrail, local school performance, Adult education and our beleaguered hospitals.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: UKIP wants a FAIRER Australian-style points-based system to decide who comes to work and settle here.
UKIP will pour £3 billion a year EXTRA into the NHS to keep it as a free public service, funded by scrapping our £55 million a day EU membership fee.
UKIP will SCRAP income tax on the minimum wage, SCRAP the bedroom tax, and SCRAP the tax on your children when you die.
By stopping our EU membership and clawing back the £30 million a day spent on foreign aid, UKIP is the ONLY PARTY with money to spend at home.
